        About this item

        • 🏆 The Original Award-Winning Acne Patch: Mighty Patch Original patch is a hydrocolloid sticker that improves the look of pimples overnight without the popping. Just stick it on, get some sleep, and wake up with clearer-looking skin.
        • ⏱️ Results in 6-8 Hours: Absorbs pimple gunk thanks to our medical-grade hydrocolloid. Clinically tested, drug-free, and safe for all skin types.
        • 🛌 All-Night Adhesion: Strong enough to stay on through a whole night of tossing, turning, and pillow-squishing. Easy to remove in the AM without redness or irritation.
        • ✨ Blends Seamlessly into Skin: The thin sticker with a translucent matte finish keeps your pimple under wraps day or night. You might just forget you’re even wearing it.
        • 🕊️ Peace-Of-Mind Design: Our hydrocolloid patches are UV sterilized, and allergy tested. Each box comes with 36 medium dots (12 millimeters) on easy-peel perforated sheets.

        From the brand

        Previous page

        2. Blemishes happen, dark spots happen, rosacea happens. Issue-prone skin is human, and it can

          often feel entirely out of our control.

          Whether you're looking to prevent, treat, or repair – we create gentle, effective solutions that help your skin fight back; so you can open up, not cover up.

        4. Pimple Patches

          Visit the Store

        5. Hero began in 2017 when I had yet another pimple emergency, but my sensitive skin had reached a breaking point. So I went looking, and found my issue wasn't just my issue – a lot of people felt just the same.

          Why wasn't there a solution that worked with the skin, not against it? The stripping, the purging, the resurfacing.

          And so Mighty Patch was born.

        7. Pimple Aftercare

          Visit the Store

        9. It's hard to trust new products when you have sensitive skin. It's why we care so much about the ingredients we use (and the ones we choose not to use).

          Our approach is: whatever we make needs to work with your skin, never against it. So we restrict over 2,400 ingredients that could cause irritation; we call it being consciously clinical.

        10. Daily Care

          Visit the Store

        Product Description

        Believe the Hype

        Mighty Patch is the smarter way to handle pimples overnight. Stick the patch on and sleep (or chill). Wait for it to turn white. Peel it off (so satisfying) and voila!

        • Pulls gunk out of pimples
        • Noticeably smaller, flatter zits
        • Results in 6-8 hours

        Don’t Pop It. Mighty Patch It.

        We know it’s tempting to pick and pop, but Mighty Patch effortlessly does the work for you—and safely.

        • Shields skin against scabs and scarring caused by popping
        • 90% of participants agree Mighty Patch is a faster way to visibly shrink whiteheads overnight than traditional zit cream
        • Wake up to clearer-looking skin

        Safe for Sensitive Skin

        Mighty Patch is safe, gentle, and non-irritating for all ages and skin types.

        • Made of medical-grade hydrocolloid
        • Chemical-free
        • Allergy tested

            How customer reviews and ratings work

            Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

            To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

            Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon

            Customers say

            Customers like the quality, visibility, and sensitivity of the skin treatment mask. For example, they mention it speeds up the healing process on blemishes, leaves behind clearer and healthier skin, and doesn't irritate their skin. They're also satisfied with the effect on skin, ease of use, and performance. That said, some complain about the value, saying it's expensive and not as good as expected. Opinions are mixed on adhesion.

            Ana Maria
            5.0 out of 5 stars Maybe not the best, but awesome for white heads
            Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
            Verified Purchase
            I have tried better pimple parches than Mighty Patch, but nothing beats stocking up when they go on sale on Amazon.
            They're very efficient at grossing out me with the quantity on gunk that can be extracted from my pores.
            But they only work in specific circumstances for me. It has to be a white head, close to breaking out or already squeezed. It doesn't get anything out of the pimple if it's under thick skin; you can use a sanitized tool to puncture the pimple. I also have to use it at least 6 hours, anything less and it doesn't suck everything, making it worse. After 6-8 hours I'm left with a hole that keeps red for maximum a day, than starts healing.
            For me they make more sense as protecting pimples ready to burst, or to safely collect gunk from something I already punctured.

            The pimple really stay put, even when I apply skincare to the rest of my face, even during sleep. But they come off skin easily when ready.

            The hydrocolloid patches are standard sized for this type of product; they're a little bit thicker, I wouldn't wear them under makeup, but I feel that protects the pimple from my picking hands better.

            I can't say I have a sensitive face, but I just can't see how these would harm even the most sensitive skin.

            Michelle
            5.0 out of 5 stars Game Changer! It really works....
            Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2021
            Verified Purchase
            Where have you been all my life!!. I am 44 yrs old. I have battled all types of acne, but primarily suffered the cystic scaring type. Acne has been under control but I have been breaking out lately on my jawline from wearing cloth masks. These new ones are the large deep painful type. I decided to try adult acumen and to my despair and dismay, I woke up to find these pesky guys multiplied by four on each side. Either a purge or reaction to sulfur.
            I immediately ordered these patches. (my son's 19 yr old daughter mentioned wanting to get these well). 2 days later they arrived. I placed about 9 patches on my jawline over the different types of pimples and kept them on overnight. I was skeptical but hopeful.
            I woke to find this little suckers actually work! 44 yrs of battle experience...nothing has worked this good. No harsh side effects, drying, peeling etc. Amazing. The pimples were depleted and the cystic ones were drastically reduced in size, no longer inflamed and painful. It looks like the patch sucked out a bunch of oil and helping it to form to a head. I will say the spots were a bit red at first but are staring to fade as day goes on. I plan to use these again on the same area tonight. I will also try on some old acne that never properly healed. I wish these were around 20 yrs ago. I'd save my face from picking, keliod scars, rippling and blown out pores. Do yourself a favor and get these!
            A bit of acne advice from a veteran:
            during breakouts in my 20s, my first instinct was to use the strongest pimple zapping chemical known to man. I would even put rubbing alcohol on my face thinking it would kill all bacteria and zap up the acne. I turned my nose up at anything that said gentle and non irritating. It wasn't till 20 yrs later and after much scarring and damage did I realize I was doing the exact opposite of what my skin needed. I finally tossed all harsh products and started treating my face gently, like you would in infant. No harsh chemicals, aboslutly no products that contained alcohol or drying agents. After I had the acne under control and healed, I opt for bit higher end products for daily cleaning and moisturing such as PCN, clinique, este lauder, olay etc. They must include some type of exfoliating agent to help shed dead skin cells so pores don't get clogged. It took me years to figure out I have sensitive skin and need gentle products. No more searching over endless drug store otc acne products -i refuse! (Neutrogena, clean & clear, clearsil etc ) I steer far from any product that has the word acne on it ( acne cleanser, acne treatment, acne prone moisturizer) despite having acne prone skin! Matter of fact, the moment I do reach for one of those products, I break out! (Not purge)Go figure! I will always be at war because I have acne prone skin. This method has me winning every battle and keeping it under control.
            Please do yourself a favor. Be gentle to your skin. Back off the harsh, over-drying chemicals. Use gentle cleansing, keep moisturizing. Let your body have the oppertunity and time it needs to heal on its own.
